title: Interactive Multimedia Learning Module for Understanding Electrochemistry

context.additional_context: Non-degree program for workplace skill enhancement, featuring offline classroom instruction with digital devices

learning_goals: Students can accurately explain concepts connecting macroscopic, microscopic, and symbolic representation levels in electrochemistry with over 80% accuracy
Students can visually analyze and explain the principles of conductivity changes in electrolyte solutions using interactive simulations
Guided by a pedagogical agent, students can perform stepwise electrolysis experiment design and interpret current-time graphs
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
